page.title: 12OUR SCHOOL COMPUTER
page.content: We got our school computer about 2 years ago and we raised the money by tattie picking and one of the Dads ran in the Glasgow Marathon and gave his sponsor money for the computer.We had a marvellous day picking potatoes. Pupils,parents,former pupils, even a prospective pupil & teachers all worked together to pick a two & a half acre field. The farmer,a parent,had said we would get Â£100 per acre, but when the Head Teacher went in for the cheque it was for Â£360 not Â£250 as the tractormen had donated their wages for the day. We had done so well that all the children got an extra Â£2 & mothers got a bag of potatoes each. With the Marathon sponsor money (Â£247) and our tattie picking money we had enough for our computer package and also for a disc drive. We now have 2 monitors,2 BBC computers and 2 disc drives.
